name: O’BRIEN OFORDU
title: Chairman, Board of Directors
description:
O’Brien Ofordu is the Chairman, Board of Directors, Avvic Group. He brings to the Board over three decades of corporate management, public service and business leadership experience and capacity.O’Brien Ofordu has served as Managing Director at Enugu State Water Corporation, Field Operations and Marketing Coordinator at Manitoba Hydro International’s Revenue Cycle Management Program for Power Holding Company of Nigeria, Project Manager at Wardrop Nigeria Limited for DFID’s Revenue Management Project for Enugu State Water Corporation, Managing Director and Chief Executive Officer at Keralux Nigeria Limited, Consultant and Project Coordinator at Charnel Group of Companies, Director of Food Services at Manoir Dorval Quebec Canada, Supervisor at Griffith McConnell Residence Montreal, Quebec, Canada. 
 He also served as the Senior Special Adviser to the Enugu State Government on Water Projects where he worked to develop the Roadmap to Public – Private Partnership in metering, pipeline replacement, pipeline extension, World Bank assisted reforms and enhancement of sustainable IGR.O’Brien Ofordu is an Alumnus of the prestigious Concordia University, Montreal, Quebec, Canada where he holds a B.Sc. in Political Science and holds a Diploma in Dietetics from Carlton University, Canada

name: UCHENNA CHUKWUEKE
title: Group Managing Director/Chief Executive Officer ​
description:
Uchenna Azubuike Chukwueke is the Group Managing Director and Chief Executive Officer. 
 He holds a B.Sc in Sociology and an MBA in Business Administration. He has developed requisite proficiencies in Business Development, Strategic Business Management, Project Planning and Project Management. 
 Prior to joining the Management Team at Avvic Group, he had worked with Zenith Bank Plc for over fifteen years in different business development capacities. He also worked with VFD Group, a finance and digital banking firm, as Regional Head South East. 
 Uchenna Chukwueke brings his focused and result-oriented experience to the Board.

name: OBIOMA AKPAGBULA
title: Executive Director ​
description:
Obioma Akpagbula is the Group Executive Director, Finance and Strategy. 
 He brings to the Group, core competencies in investment and portfolio management, risk management, banking operations, corporate financial management, financial analysis and business development. 
 His experience in the financial sector spans over seventeen years during which he worked with Zenith Bank Plc in different capacities. 
 Obioma Akpagbula holds a B.Sc. and M.Sc. in Economics. He is an Associate of the Chartered Institute of Stockbrokers Nigeria and the Chartered Institute for Securities and Investment United Kingdom.

name: SAMUEL NDUBUISI OSEAFIANA
title: Executive Director​
description:
Samuel Oseafiana is the Group Executive Director, Governance, Risk and Compliance. He has developed specific skills in business process, financial management and strategic sales dynamics in the banking industry. 
 Samuel started his career with Zenith Bank Plc in 2009, rose through the ranks and necessary experiences to become the head of Enugu zonal cash management team. In 2019 he joined the Business Development team of Zenith bank plc. 
 He joined AVVIC group in 2022 and was appointed the Managing Director of Avvic Connect Ltd. Samuel holds a degree in Accounting Education from the University of Benin, Benin City, a student member of Chartered institute of Bankers of Nigeria (CIBN) and a member of the Institute of Chartered Accountants of Nigeria (ICAN).

name: ODERA OGBODO
title: Executive Director
description:
Odera Ogbodo is the Group Executive Director, Technology, Research and Development. 
 He brings to the Board, extensive competencies in IT, data analysis, tech analysis, electronic business development and management. 
 He worked as a Data and Tech Analyst at the University of Greenwich, London. He also worked as an Electronic Business Analyst with Zenith Bank Plc. He was Lead, Enterprise and Application Support for VFD Tech Limited. 
 Odera Ogbodo holds a B.Sc, First Class Honours, in Information and Communication Technology from the prestigious University of Greenwich, London.

name: PROF. PASCHAL ILOEGBUl PETER OKOLIE (JP)
title: Non Executive Director ​
description:
He is an astute financial management expert and consultant with over three decades of academic, professional, corporate, and public service experience. 
 Prof. Okolie served as the Accountant-General, Enugu State and Permanent Secretary, Enugu State Ministry of Finance. His professional stewardship saw him serve as the Chairman, Forum of Accountants-General in Nigeria; Chairman, Association of National Accountants of Nigeria (ANAN), Enugu State Branch; Chairman, Enugu and District Society of Chartered Institute of Taxation of Nigeria (CITN); member of Technical and International Affairs Committee of ANAN; and member of Workshops and Conferences Committee of ANAN. 
 Prof. Paschal Iloegbu Peter Okolie holds a PhD in Finance, MBA and M.Sc in Banking and Finance and B.Sc (Hons.) in Accountancy. 
 He is a Fellow, Association of National Accountants of Nigeria (FCNA); Fellow, Chartered Institute of Taxation of Nigeria (FCTI); Fellow, Institute of Management Consultants (FIMC); Fellow, Association of Management and Social Sciences Researchers of Nigeria (FAMSSRN); Doctoral Fellow of the Institute of Professional Financial Managers of London (DFPFM, London); Member, Nigerian Institute of Management (NIM), Member, Sub-Committee on Government Ministries and Agencies of AMSSRN.
